Sentence: The complement system is a crucial part of the immune defense.
Label: Definition

Sentence: It is activated through several pathways, including the classical, lectin, and alternative pathways.
Label: Explanation

Sentence: In contrast, if not regulated properly, the system can cause damage to healthy cells.
Label: Contrast

Sentence: Overall, the complement system plays a vital role in eliminating pathogens and initiating immune responses.
Label: Summary

Sentence: Understanding its activation and roles is essential for comprehending immune defense mechanisms.
Label: Purpose
